query: Please prepare a 3-day travel plan for 2 individuals departing Des Moines and heading to Detroit, covering the dates of March 23rd to March 25th, 2022. Our budget is set at $1,100. Our accommodations must be suitable for children under 10, and we prefer rooms that are not shared. Please note that we will not be self-driving on this trip.
